mDebugComponent.description: For showing a preview of what will happen in the editor

mEditorSprite.description: An unknown type (likely an Unreal Engine or plugin type).

mCapsuleComponent.description: An unknown type (likely an Unreal Engine or plugin type).

mNumberOfCreatures.description: The number of enemies to spawn, used offline

mSpawnRadius.description: Within what radius do you want to spawn the enemies (the won't go outside of this radius)

mSpawnHalfHeight.description: How much up/down our spawner tries to search for a placeable location

mIsActive.description: Indicates if we have spawned our enemies

mSpawnData.description: Structure for keeping all data saved about enemies spawned

mSplines.description: Path splines that enemies in this spawner should set to follow

mRespawnTimeIndays.description: How many days should pass before creatures start to respawn ( -1 means never )
